select coalesce(count(msg_num),0) from msg where receiver=#{loginid} and recv_del='삭제전'and send_clx='1'
select coalesce(count(msg_num),0) from msg where receiver=#{loginid} and recv_del='삭제전'and send_clx='1' and chk='읽지않음'
